titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. J. K.P. Gilliland & Allen Gilliland, Judgment
CWG6611

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
State of Kentucky,
Cumberland Circuit Court
Commonwealth Plff
vs } Indictment for Tipling
J K P & Allen Gilliland Defts

This day came the parties by their attorneys, and the Defts by attorney produced and filed their demurrer herein and upon consideration the demurrer is overruled to which opinion and ruling the Defendant by attorney excepts and on motion of Defts and by agreement of attorney the Said Defts confessed themselves each indebted to the Commonwealth of Kentucky in the Sum of Sixty Dollars it is therefore ordered and adjudged by the court that Plaintiff recover of Said Defendants the Sum of Sixty Dollars each and the costs of this prosecution -- the they may be taken --

a copy
att
J. M. Boles clk

Commonwealth
v } Copy Judgement
J K P & Allen Gilliland
